newsitem.title: JAPAN: Moody's assigns A1 counterparty rating to TDK.
newsitem.headline: Moody's assigns A1 counterparty rating to TDK.

text.p: Moody's Investors Service said on Friday it had assigned an A1 counterparty rating to TDK Corp.
The rating reflects TDK's leading position in the global electronic component market, its technological superiority, and its strong financial profile, the rating agency said.
TDK uses currency derivatives to manage currency risk, and interest rate swaps to manage fluctuations in interest rates arising from existing debt, Moody's said.
Those transactions are controlled and monitored by the general manager of the Finance and Accounting Department of TDK, it said.
Moody's believes that the controls on derivative activities by the company are adequate, it said.
